item.description:
Hello Canucks,

For March's meetup we'll be doing another activity. We'll meet at the Loews in Boston Common for a 7:30 show and then we can out for drinks after the movie. We can decide on a movie as the day approaches.

Thanks,

Andrew

About this Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a brown toque...

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Expat Canadian March Meetup
